name: Ostturm demo
description:
Short battle system demo of our game. It's currently is still in pre-production, and we are open to any feedback.

Ostturm is meant to be a mix of XCOM and Darkest Dungeon in the world inspired by Prince of Persia: Warrior Within.

If you are interested you may contact us by following contact links on our website: ostturm.com

Setting:

An ancient treasure has been found in the canyons at the edge of the world. People of all sorts became slowly drawn to it.

Lead a group of mercenaries to uncover the secrets of the Wound of the Earth.
